availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, famer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Murry Hays. Father of Anderson Hays, Samuel Hays, Martin Hays, Bazeal Hays, and Lafayette Hays. Married to Margaret Carter Hays in Lawrence County on June 20, 1859. Father of Elizabeth Hays and Louisa Hays. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 193A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 518.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, Precinct No. 5, p. 227B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994044, Lawrence County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 2056.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lawrence County Marriages, Film 000840550.
